Alfred Allen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_Allen_(actor) 0 For other persons named Alfred Allen, see Alfred Allen (disambiguation) Alfred Allen (April 8, 1866 – June 18, 1947) was an American silent film actor and author. For other_persons named Alfred_Allen , see Alfred_Allen ( disambiguation ) Alfred_Allen ( April_8 , 1866 – June_18_,_1947 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor_and_author .
